reviewText: Absolutely Wow ... This had to be the best looking LD I have purchased yet Collectors Edition with photos and extra's disc including music that was deleted from movie and behind the scenes and special effects , comes with six sides 3 disc this is one nice box set. Tron is One of my Favorite Movies Love Tron 1982 A Classic and another is Tron Legacy 2010 with Sam Flynn. I can't wait for the 3rd Tron Coming out Soon as they say ..... Flynn Lives
Warning people this isn't a Lazerdisc, it's a CED. Lazerdisc players don't accept that format. CEDs are a format that ran along side Lazerdiscs for a few short years in the 80's.
The item for sale NOT a LaserDisc. It is a Videodisc, which is a different technology, requiring a different player.
